name: ar-common
description: A repo for discussing and capturing information about cross-API aspects of augmented reality

name: cardboard-vr-display
description: A JavaScript implementation of a WebVR 1.1 VRDisplay

name: community-resources
description: Common resources for all Immersive Web Community Group repositories

name: computer-vision
description: A feature repo for exploring computer vision APIs for XR. Feature Lead: Blair MacIntyre

name: detached-elements
description: Using HTML/CSS to bring elements outside the window in Immersive Web browsers. Feature leads: Dean Jackson  and Ada Rose Cannon

name: geo-alignment
description: For work toward a feature in WebXR to geo-align coordinate systems. Feature lead: Blair MacIntyre

name: immersive-web-weekly
description: The site and content for the Immersive Web Weekly newsletter

name: immersive-web.github.io
description: Organization page for the Immersive Web Working Group and Community Group

name: marker-tracking
description: Additions to the WebXR Device API for Marker Tracking: https://immersive-web.github.io/marker-tracking/

name: model-element
description: Repository for the <model> tag

name: navigation
description: Repository for the discussion and research in to navigating from page to page whilst staying in immersive mode. Feature leads: Rik Cabanier and Brandon Jones

name: performance-improvements
description: A feature-incubation repo for XR-related performance improvements. Feature lead: Trevor F. Smith

name: proposals
description: Initial proposals for future Immersive Web work (see README)

name: raw-camera-access
description: Spec draft: https://immersive-web.github.io/raw-camera-access/.  Repository for experimentation around exposing raw camera access through WebXR Device API. Feature leads: Piotr Bialecki, Alex Turner, Nicholas Butko

name: real-world-geometry
description: Additions to WebXR Device API for exposing real world data (Lead: Piotr Bialecki). Plane detection: https://immersive-web.github.io/real-world-geometry/plane-detection.html

name: spatial-favicons
description: A proposal for favicon support for  a new data type. Feature lead: Rik Cabanier

name: webvr
description: Archival repository for the legacy WebVR Specification.

name: webvr-polyfill
description: Use WebVR today, without requiring a special browser build.

name: webvr-polyfill-dpdb
description: An up-to-date Device Parameter Database for the WebVR Polyfill

name: webvrrocks
description: Your guide to Virtual Reality in the browser.

name: webxr-input-profiles
description: WebXR Gamepad assets, source library, and schema

name: webxr-layers-polyfill
description: WebXR Layers Polyfill library. Lead: Rik Cabanier.

name: webxr-polyfill
description: Use the WebXR Device API today, providing fallbacks to native WebVR 1.1 and Cardboard

name: webxr-samples
description: Samples to demonstrate use of the WebXR Device API
